components.data: 1.Stool suspensions were created by mixing 0.1 g of stool sample, 0.1 mL of chloroform, and 1 mL of phosphate-buffered saline.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 1.Stool suspensions were created by mixing 0.1 g of stool sample, 0.1 mL of chloroform, and 1 mL of phosphate-buffered saline.

components.data: The suspensions were shaken vigorously for 20 min followed by centrifugation at 3,000 × g for 5 min at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The suspensions were shaken vigorously for 20 min followed by centrifugation at 3,000 × g for 5 min at 4°C.

components.data: 3.For rectal swab samples, the supernatant was prepared by centrifuging the fluid at 13,000 × g for 1 min and transferring the supernatant to a fresh tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 3.For rectal swab samples, the supernatant was prepared by centrifuging the fluid at 13,000 × g for 1 min and transferring the supernatant to a fresh tube.

components.data: Viral RNA was extracted from 200 μL of supernatant using the viral RNA mini kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Viral RNA was extracted from 200 μL of supernatant using the viral RNA mini kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
